screen.selectDescription: Use of BLOBS (note: using content of the 2nd SIARD package)
screen.subtitle: Integration of RTF, JPG, PDF
screen.query:
SELECT "dbo"."table10"."id", "dbo"."table10"."poradi",
CASE WHEN "obsah" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "RTF",
CASE WHEN "picture" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "JPG",
CASE WHEN "documentpdf" IS NULL THEN null ELSE "dbo"."table10"."poradi" END AS "PDF",
"dbo"."table10"."name" FROM "dbo"."table10"

blob.query: SELECT 'application/rtf' AS "ContentType", 'obsah.rtf' AS "filename", "obsah" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'image/jpeg' AS "ContentType", 'picture.jpg' AS "filename", "picture" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
SELECT 'application/pdf' AS "ContentType", 'document.pdf' AS "filename", "documentpdf" AS "blob" FROM "dbo"."table10" WHERE "poradi" = ?
